plugin.name: recaptcha
plugin.author: Chad Johnston
plugin.title: This plugin adds ReCaptcha support to Grails.
plugin.description:
ReCaptcha is a CAPTCHA implementation that has a goal of better digitizing books by having users identify words that traditional OCR systems have missed. This plugin uses the ReCaptcha Java library available from http://code.google.com/p/recaptcha/.
